sentence.Network_en: In 2001, the Arnage RL, a long wheelbase limousine model, was launched.
sentence.Network_cn: 2001年, 宾利雅致RL, 长轴距轿车模型, 拉开战幕.

sentence.Network_en: Authentic in every detail, from stretched wheelbase to sweeping double S - bend exhaust.
sentence.Network_cn: 细节完美表现, 后扫式双S型排气装置是其亮点.

sentence.Network_en: This requires that the wheelbase to equal sides of the vehicle.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就要求平等的轴距对车辆的两侧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 座管角度被高估了的一点是总轮距(wheelbase)的影响。 为了维持正确的上管长度固定不变,座管如果因而迁就做挺直一些,不就把上管向前推了,影响所及就是头管也.

the 5-series Touring will be a little wider and longer that current generation , being built on a shortened wheelbase platform , the same one it shares with the 7-series .5系列旅游将是一个更广泛和更小，目前的一代，是建立在缩短轴距平台，同一个股票它的7系列。

some details we can gather from the spy shots include bigger air intakes at the sides of the car , a new centrally mounted exhaust system and a slightly longer wheelbase .的一些细节，我们可以收集到的间谍杆包括更大的进气口在双方汽车，安装了新的中央排气系统和略长的轴距。
switching from a Volkswagen Phaeton to an Audi A8 axle allows for a shorter front overhang and results in a longer wheelbase for the coupe ;开关从大众辉腾的奥迪A8前轴允许较短的前悬和结果在一个较长的轴距的轿车；

entry.tran: (汽车或其他交通工具前后轮之间的)轴距
entry.def: The wheelbase of a car or other vehicle is the distance between its front and back wheels.

means.word_mean: 1. the distance from the center of a car's front wheel to the rear axle
